title: ANR occurring on low-end Android devices [closed]
text:
I am experiencing ANR(APP not Responding) issues after updating my Android game on the Play Store. The issue occurs primarily on low-end devices. The game is built using Unity, and the same codebase works correctly in my other games. I have not made major structural changes in this update. I am trying to identify the root cause of the ANR and understand what could be triggering it specifically on low-end devices.

*** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** *** ***
